commonIssues.subtitle: Solutions for the most common problems

q1.question: I forgot my password
q1.answer: Click on 'Forgot Password' on the login page. We will send a reset code to your registered mobile phone.

q2.question: Not receiving SMS code
q2.answer: Check that the phone number is correct, you have good reception, and SMS messages are not blocked. If the problem persists, contact support.

q3.question: My account is blocked
q3.answer: Account blocking can be due to multiple failed login attempts. Contact support to unblock your account.

q1.question: The site is not loading
q1.answer: Try refreshing the page, clearing your browser's cache, or using a different browser. Also check your internet connection.

q2.question: Cannot upload files
q2.answer: Make sure the file is in a supported format (PDF, DOC, DOCX) and does not exceed 10MB. Try uploading one file at a time.

q3.question: The questionnaire is not saving
q3.answer: Ensure you have a stable internet connection and have answered all required questions. Try saving again or refreshing the page.

q1.question: How long does it take to approve a candidacy?
q1.answer: The candidacy approval process takes up to 5 business days. You will receive an email notification when your candidacy is approved.

q2.question: How can I update my details?
q2.answer: Log in to your account and click on 'Account Settings'. There you can update your personal details.

q3.question: What happens if I want to cancel my candidacy?
q3.answer: Candidacy can be canceled at any time through account settings or by contacting support.
